Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $(this.appearance:height) in height and $(this.appearance:build) in build, $(this.trait:name) is $(this.trait:stage) of $(this.appearance:skin) fur with a {? equal | $(this.appearance:hashair) | yes | head of $(this.appearance:hairlength) $(this.appearance:hairtype) $(this.appearance:haircolor) hair$(this.appearance:hairstyle_string)| bald head}. $(this.trait:possessive) $(this.appearance:eyeshape) $(this.appearance:eyecolor) eyes are accentuated by $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrows and $(this.appearance:browshape) forehead. $(this.appearance:noseshape) nose and $(this.appearance:mouthshape) mouth with $(this.appearance:lipshape) lips complete the appearance.

$(this.appearance:height) in height and $(this.appearance:build) in build, $(this.trait:name) is $(this.trait:stage) of $(this.appearance:skin) fur with a {? equal | $(this.appearance:hashair) | yes | head of $(this.appearance:hairlength) $(this.appearance:hairtype) $(this.appearance:haircolor) hair$(this.appearance:hairstyle_string)| bald head}.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: (\{ "THIS slowwwwly raises POSSESSIVE hands over his head, bringing them together in celebratory applause." \})
(\{ "THIS unhurriedly lifts POSSESSIVE feet one-after-another and pumps his arms side-to-side in a sultrily slow sloth shimmy." \})
(\{ "THIS tightens POSSESSIVE lanky arms around Topsy to give a snuggly hug." \})
(\{ "With a smile, THIS puckers POSSESSIVE lips and plants a kiss on Topsy's cheek before bashfully lowering POSSESSIVE eyelids." \})
(\{ "In utter slow motion, THIS throws POSSESSIVE hands in the air and waves 'em like NOMINATIVE just don't care." \})
(\{ "THIS gradually opens POSSESSIVE mouth and erupts in a happy sing song, \\"Meehhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!\\"" \})
(\{ "THIS slowly bats POSSESSIVE eyes as a joyful smile stretches over his face." \})
